name: -webkit-box-orient
description: Specifies the layout of elements nested within a flexible box element.
longDescription: This property applies only to flexible box layouts. For more information about flexible boxes, see http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-layout/.

<orientation>.description: The orientation of elements nested in the flexible box.

values.block-axis: Elements are oriented along the box's axis.
values.inline-axis: Elements are oriented along the inline axis.
